weapons.name: Envoys Edge
weapons.lore: A dependable blade carried by the scouts.

weapons.name: Officers Sword
weapons.lore: A dependable blade carried by the scouts.

weapons.name: The Eve Sword
weapons.lore: A dependable blade carried by the scouts.

weapons.name: Minty Fresh
weapons.lore: A dependable blade carried by the scouts.

weapons.name: Bone sword
weapons.lore: A dependable blade carried by the scouts.

weapons.name: Crab Saber
weapons.lore: A dependable blade carried by the scouts.

weapons.name: Grief
weapons.lore: A dependable blade carried by the scouts.

weapons.name: Epoch Blade
weapons.lore: A dependable blade carried by the scouts.

weapons.name: Porciline
weapons.lore: A dependable blade carried by the scouts.

weapons.name: Radiant Refraction
weapons.lore: A dependable blade carried by the scouts.

weapons.name: RC Blade
weapons.lore: A dependable blade carried by the scouts.

weapons.name: Short Hand
weapons.lore: A dependable blade carried by the scouts.

weapons.name: Wall Captain's Rapier
weapons.lore: A light, precise sidearm for high-ranking officers, emphasizing speed and finesse.

weapons.name: Gift Ribbon Foil
weapons.lore: A rapier with a surprisingly sharp blade made from compressed festive ribbon, granting fast, light attacks.

weapons.name: Pretzel Rod Rapier
weapons.lore: A long, salted pretzel rod reinforced for combat. Its savory flavor is distracting to foes.

weapons.name: Swordfish Bake
weapons.lore: The hardened, baked bill of a swordfish, used as a naturally pointy thrusting weapon.

weapons.name: Tea Cup Sword
weapons.lore: A fine porcelain teacup acts as the guard for this delicate but sharp blade. Best used at formal duels.

weapons.name: Harpoon Thruster
weapons.lore: A repurposed harpoon used for quick, deep thrusts. A charged attack releases a powerful backward shove.

weapons.name: Narwhal Tusk
weapons.lore: The horn-like tooth of a Narwhal, revered by the Ice Elves as a pure, piercing weapon.

weapons.name: Icicle Thorn
weapons.lore: A needle-thin rapier made from magically compressed, long-lasting ice.

weapons.name: Giant Sewing Needle
weapons.lore: A massive sewing needle with a thread-wrapped grip and a button guard. Perfect for precision stabbing.

weapons.name: Pipe Puncture
weapons.lore: Various metal pipes welded and sharpened into a durable, unrefined rapier.

weapons.name: Quill Puncture
weapons.lore: A long quill with an enchanted, extremely sharp point that builds up poison damage.

weapons.name: Slinky Saber
weapons.lore: A compressed slinky forms the body of the blade. It can dramatically extend its reach on a charged lunge.

weapons.name: Tesla Coil Rapier
weapons.lore: A gear coil attached to a handle that discharges focused electricity on charged thrusts.

weapons.name: Frost Wand
weapons.lore: Carved from ancient Ice Elf roots, it hums with frost.

weapons.name: Wall Captain Great Sword
weapons.lore: The ceremonial sword awarded to a Wall Captain, symbolizing unwavering dedication to duty.

weapons.name: Sleigh Runner Blade
weapons.lore: Crafted from a reinforced sleigh runner, giving it unparalleled straight-line speed.

weapons.name: Bread Slicer
weapons.lore: A gargantuan bread knife that delivers incredibly clean, deep cuts. Always slightly warm.

weapons.name: Choc Wok
weapons.lore: A massive slab of hardened chocolate, sweet in smell but brutally heavy in combat.

weapons.name: Great Grater
weapons.lore: A large blade covered in deep grating holes, designed to shred the armor of enemies.

weapons.name: Ice Lolli Blade
weapons.lore: A giant, frozen confection shaped like a sword. Cold enough to cause frost buildup quickly.

weapons.name: Strife
weapons.lore: A shard of ancient, pure ice. Its power builds in a widening circle around the wielder.

weapons.name: Whalebone Greatsword
weapons.lore: Forged from the fused spine bones of a gargantuan Arctic whale. Exceptionally strong and light for its size.

weapons.name: Expenda-Man Sword
weapons.lore: A futuristic sci-fi blade from an old action figure set. Its heavy attacks shoot fire slashes.

weapons.name: Stained Glass Greatsword
weapons.lore: A magnificent, full-sized blade constructed entirely from hardened stained glass panels.

weapons.name: Teddy Bear Stitcher
weapons.lore: A giant sewing needle mounted on a hilt. Used to stitch up toy breaches, but capable of devastating piercing damage.

weapons.name: Frostfang
weapons.lore: Forged by Ice Elf chiefs, its chill never fades.

weapons.name: Swift Needle
weapons.lore: A lightning-fast thrusting sword favored by duelists.

weapons.name: Cadet Academy Shield
weapons.lore: Standard issue shield for Christmas Elf academy cadets. Bears the academy insignia.

weapons.name: Sleigh Shield
weapons.lore: Crafted from reinforced sleigh materials, used by elite delivery units.

weapons.name: Poinsettia Shield
weapons.lore: Beautiful yet durable shield with poinsettia patterns. Favored by officers.

weapons.name: Pancake Shield
weapons.lore: Surprisingly resilient breakfast-themed shield. Light and easy to carry.

weapons.name: Wafer Shield
weapons.lore: Delicate-looking but surprisingly sturdy cookie wafer shield.

weapons.name: Saucer Shield
weapons.lore: Tea saucer repurposed as a shield. Perfect for afternoon tea defense.

weapons.name: Cutting Board
weapons.lore: Heavy wooden cutting board used by Foodkin chefs for defense.

weapons.name: Gingerbread Shield
weapons.lore: Festive shield that smells of cinnamon and holiday spices.

weapons.name: Cookie Shield
weapons.lore: Chocolate chip cookie shield that can shoot bursts of chocolate chips to stagger weak enemies.
weapons.special_effect: Shoots chocolate chips to stagger enemies

weapons.name: Dark Chocolate Shield
weapons.lore: Massive shield made of hardened dark chocolate. Surprisingly durable.

weapons.name: Snowflake Shield
weapons.lore: Delicate ice-crafted shield with intricate snowflake patterns.

weapons.name: Whale Bone Shield
weapons.lore: Light shield crafted from whale bones found along icy shores.

weapons.name: Imp Wing Shield
weapons.lore: Crafted from 25 ice imp wings. Earned through perseverance against the frozen pests.

weapons.name: Frosted Bark Shield
weapons.lore: Shield made from the bark of ancient frost-resistant trees.

weapons.name: Sled Shield
weapons.lore: Reinforced sled converted into a massive defensive barrier.

weapons.name: Frostbite Mirror
weapons.lore: End-game legendary shield. Polished ice that reflects attacks and freezes opponents.

weapons.name: Toy Box Lid
weapons.lore: Sturdy lid from a child's toy chest. Surprisingly effective defense.

weapons.name: Gear Shield
weapons.lore: Interlocking gears that can rotate to deflect attacks at angles.

weapons.name: Stained Glass Shield
weapons.lore: Beautiful stained glass artwork mounted on a sturdy frame.

weapons.name: Diamond Card
weapons.lore: Playing card shield with diamond suit pattern. Light and quick.

weapons.name: Twilight Great Shield
weapons.lore: Massive stained glass shield depicting a twilight scene.

weapons.name: Sunset Great Shield
weapons.lore: Grand stained glass shield showing a beautiful sunset panorama.

weapons.name: Expenda-Man Shield
weapons.lore: Futuristic shield that fires a flamethrower with area-of-effect floor damage.

weapons.name: Train Cow Catcher
weapons.lore: Massive locomotive cow catcher converted into a shield. Locomotion ability allows sustained charge with ethereal train.
weapons.special_effect: Locomotion: sustained charge with ethereal train

weapons.name: Train Cow Catcher
weapons.special_effect: Locomotion: sustained charge with ethereal train

weapons.name: Jolly Mallet
weapons.lore: A heavy hammer used to build Santa's workshop, now for battle.

weapons.name: Coal Forger
weapons.lore: A dense, heavy hammer used to compress and purify raw coal for the workshop's furnaces.

weapons.name: Guardian Hammer
weapons.lore: A reward for the highest-ranking Wall Guards, symbolizing the strength of the command.

weapons.name: Reindeer Sledgehammer
weapons.lore: A tool used for constructing the sleigh dock, its mass delivers immense blunt force.

weapons.name: Brussel Sprout Club
weapons.lore: A giant, dense brussel sprout fixed to a sturdy stick. Infamous for its powerful spin attack.

weapons.name: Soda Can Basher
weapons.lore: A hammer made from a massive, pressurized soda can. Explodes with fizzy damage on heavy hits.

weapons.name: Honey Dipper Mace
weapons.lore: A giant, sticky honey dipper. Enemies struck are slowed by the thick, sweet residue.

weapons.name: Inferno Hot Pot
weapons.lore: A cooking pot filled with scalding liquid, serving as the hammer's head.

weapons.name: Maki Slammer
weapons.lore: A giant, tightly rolled maki sushi on a stick. Heavy and densely packed.

weapons.name: Nigiri Basher
weapons.lore: A huge slab of nigiri rice and fish. Smells great, hits hard.

weapons.name: Watermelon Masher
weapons.lore: Half a watermelon mounted on a haft. Its juicy, blunt impact is surprisingly effective.

weapons.name: Melted Anchor
weapons.lore: The hook of a great naval anchor, partially melted down and reforged into a mighty hammerhead.

weapons.name: Mammoth Tusk Masher
weapons.lore: The base of a massive mammoth tusk, granting devastating frost damage and area-of-effect ice waves.

weapons.name: Nordic Forger
weapons.lore: A hammer forged in the Ice Elf's ancient mountain workshops, capable of shattering frozen armor.

weapons.name: Bell Ringer
weapons.lore: A heavy clapper from the Clock Tower bell. Capable of unleashing destructive sonic ripples.

weapons.name: Kaleidoscope Club
weapons.lore: The scope on a stick. Its hits don't just strike, they carve brilliant, kaleidoscopic energy waves.

weapons.name: Melody Mallet
weapons.lore: A music box mounted on a stick. Each heavy swing plays a tune that can confuse enemies.

weapons.name: Rainbow Rumbler
weapons.lore: Dozens of crayons rubber-banded together on a pencil shaft, leaving colorful trails on impact.

weapons.name: Train Hammer
weapons.lore: A heavy toy train mounted on an old rail switcher. Uses steam power for powerful, fire-based heavy attacks.

weapons.name: Banner Spear
weapons.lore: A spear decorated with Christmas Elf battle banners. Excellent reach.

weapons.name: Candy Cane Lance
weapons.lore: A decorative yet deadly lance made from reinforced peppermint.

weapons.name: Ice Drill
weapons.lore: Used by Ice Elves to bore through thick ice. Extremely high piercing damage.

weapons.name: Robot Antenna
weapons.lore: A salvaged antenna from a giant Toykin robot, repurposed as a staff.

weapons.name: North Star Spear
weapons.lore: Topped with a crystalline star that guides the wielder. Used by elite guard.

weapons.name: Hard Chocolate Spear
weapons.lore: Made from tempered, dark chocolate. Surprisingly durable, but melts near fire.

weapons.name: Sundae Skewer
weapons.lore: A tall, sharp ice-cream cone polearm. Hits cause opponents to suffer a momentary cold shock.

weapons.name: Fisherman's Harpoon
weapons.lore: A heavy, barbed spear designed for hunting large ice creatures in the frozen seas.

weapons.name: Hunting Spear
weapons.lore: Standard issue hunting equipment for Ice Elf tribesmen.

weapons.name: Bone Spear
weapons.lore: Simple, sharp spear crafted from the leg bone of a frozen mammoth.

weapons.name: Caribaser
weapons.lore: Refactored from the parts and shell of a giant crab. Its strikes are heavy and blunt.

weapons.name: Luminescent Staff
weapons.lore: A simple staff with a permanently lit Toykin candle. Used to light dark corridors.

weapons.name: Stained Glass Lance
weapons.lore: A delicate yet powerful lance made from enchanted stained glass. Shatters on impact but reforms quickly.

weapons.name: Wood Cutter's Axe
weapons.lore: A sturdy, reliable axe used by logging elves to harvest festive timber.

weapons.name: Wall Guard Axe
weapons.lore: A dependable axe given to guards who survive the academy but fall short of Guardian rank.

weapons.name: Pick Axe
weapons.lore: Used primarily for excavation, its sharp point is surprisingly useful in combat.

weapons.name: Spade Axe
weapons.lore: A simple garden spade with a sharpened edge. Useful for both digging and battle.

weapons.name: Meat Cleaver
weapons.lore: A massive, heavy cleaver with an extended, sturdy handle, wielded by Foodkin butchers.

weapons.name: Pizza Cutter
weapons.lore: A large, wickedly sharp rotary blade on a wooden haft. Deals continuous cutting damage.

weapons.name: Bone Axe
weapons.lore: Crude but effective axe made from bone and sinew. Common Ice Elf weaponry.

weapons.name: Jaw Bone
weapons.lore: A terrifying axe fashioned from the preserved jawbone of a giant frozen creature.

weapons.name: Megalodon Tooth
weapons.lore: A prehistoric megalodon tooth shaped and mounted as a massive, jagged axe head.

weapons.name: Dice of Fortune
weapons.lore: A weapon built around a Dungeons & Dragons style die, granting random elemental effects.

weapons.name: Gear Axe
weapons.lore: A large, half-cut gear cog affixed to a stick. Its spinning teeth remain dangerously sharp.

weapons.name: Stained Glass Axe
weapons.lore: A beautiful but fragile axe, its light refractions can momentarily blind opponents.

weapons.name: Tambourine Axe
weapons.lore: The sharpened jingles and frame of a tambourine repurposed for chopping.

weapons.name: Tinsel Twister
weapons.lore: A wand wrapped in enchanted tinsel, capable of launching harmless but dazzling distractions.

weapons.name: Peppermint Rod
weapons.lore: Carved from solidified peppermint oil. Emits gusts of invigorating, frosty air.

weapons.name: Gingerbread Stick
weapons.lore: A fragile-looking wand that smells of spices. It can summon minor gingerbread minions.

weapons.name: Frost Wand
weapons.lore: Carved from ancient Ice Elf roots, it hums with frost.

weapons.name: Blizzard Spire
weapons.lore: A masterfully crafted spire that can conjure powerful, localized blizzards.

weapons.name: Wind-up Key
weapons.lore: A giant, enchanted wind-up key that manipulates time around enemies.

weapons.name: Blink Rod
weapons.lore: A Toykin rod that allows the caster to teleport short distances.

weapons.name: High Forger Gloves
weapons.lore: Blacksmith gloves treated to withstand extreme temperatures, granting the wielder fire damage on strike.

weapons.name: Kringle Knuckles
weapons.lore: Brass knuckles wrapped in tough leather, used to deliver surprisingly solid holiday cheer.

weapons.name: Grater Gauntlets
weapons.lore: Gauntlets crafted from salvaged cheese graters. Their rough surface shreds armor and flesh.

weapons.name: Donut Glazes
weapons.lore: Gloves covered in crystallized sugar glaze, making the fists heavy and sticky upon impact.

weapons.name: Bear Claws
weapons.lore: Gloves reinforced with the actual claws of a massive ice bear, guaranteeing severe bleed damage.

weapons.name: Bone Claws
weapons.lore: Simple, lightweight claws carved from ice creature bone for swift, consecutive attacks.

weapons.name: Wolf Fang Claws
weapons.lore: A reward given to hunters who successfully collect 50 high-quality wolf pelts. Deep, jagged bleed wounds.

weapons.name: Jester Gloves
weapons.lore: Gloves worn by the Toykin tricksters. Lined with a subtle coating of irritating poison.

weapons.name: RC Gauntlets
weapons.lore: Gauntlets built from old remote control parts. They store and release high bursts of electricity.

weapons.name: Toy Maker's Knife
weapons.lore: A precision blade used by master elves to carve intricate wooden toys. Deadly in the right hands.

weapons.name: Ornament Shard
weapons.lore: A jagged dagger made from a broken, reinforced holiday ornament. Surprisingly sharp.

weapons.name: Fish Dreger
weapons.lore: Shaped like a curved sickle, traditionally used for pulling in large fishing nets. Can be thrown like a boomerang.

weapons.name: Skewered Fruit Knife
weapons.lore: A short, sharp knife used for preparing delicate fruit skewers. Applies a minor paralyzing poison.

weapons.name: Hunter Bone Dagger
weapons.lore: A ceremonial dagger crafted from the first kill of a young Ice Elf hunter. Deals high critical damage.

weapons.name: Ice Sliver
weapons.lore: A pure shard of magical ice that never melts, used for quick, quiet assassinations.

weapons.name: Miniature Scissors
weapons.lore: Giant sewing scissors reduced in size and sharpened into two separate daggers.

weapons.name: Dart Tip
weapons.lore: A highly aerodynamic tip of a projectile dart, engineered for maximum throw distance.

weapons.name: Bell Ringer Pistol
weapons.lore: Fires small, hardened brass bells, or unleashes a disorienting sonic blast upon impact.

weapons.name: Gumball Shooter
weapons.lore: A simple, candy-dispenser weapon that fires pressurized gumballs. Surprisingly sticky.

weapons.name: Bone Pistol
weapons.lore: A crude, powerful pistol assembled from various bones that fires small, sharp bone fragments.

weapons.name: Cork Gun
weapons.lore: A classic Toykin pistol, fires blunt, pressurized corks for non-lethal stuns.

weapons.name: Coal Gun
weapons.lore: A devastating close-range weapon that fires lumps of compressed, fiery coal.

weapons.name: Double Barrel Ice Breaker
weapons.lore: A specialized shotgun designed to shatter thick ice, firing hardened steel slugs.

weapons.name: Bubble Barrel Bouncing Ball Gun
weapons.lore: The BBBB Gun. Fires a wide spread of hyper-bouncy balls that ricochet around the battlefield.

weapons.name: Bubble Barrel Battery Gun
weapons.lore: A weapon that fires old batteries, dealing explosive electric shock on impact.

weapons.name: Retro Repuncher SMG
weapons.lore: A game console SMG. Insert a cartridge to rapidly fire pixel-like energy bolts. Requires a blow to the magazine to clear jams.

weapons.name: Smarties SMG
weapons.lore: Built into a Smarties box casing, it rapidly fires hard candies or M&M's. Highly distracting.

weapons.name: Cardboard Gun
weapons.lore: A weapon built almost entirely from cardboard that fires backing peanuts. Highly susceptible to water damage.

weapons.name: Present Wrap Repeater
weapons.lore: Fires tightly rolled wads of heavy-duty gift wrap, dealing surprising blunt force trauma.

weapons.name: Teapot Sniper
weapons.lore: A sniper rifle built from a teapot, firing focused, high-pressure streams of scalding hot tea for severe burn damage.

weapons.name: Zink Pipe Sniper
weapons.lore: Built from zinc piping with a high-pressure gas chamber, firing razor-sharp screws with extreme velocity.

weapons.name: Toy Rail Gun
weapons.lore: A retro-steampunk design that uses magnetic rails to accelerate toy trains to incredible, destructive speeds.

weapons.name: Bone Sniper
weapons.lore: A long-range rifle that uses a massive pressure chamber to fire dense rib bones for heavy armor piercing.

weapons.name: Harpoon Launcher
weapons.lore: A massive rifle that fires heavy, tethered harpoons. Capable of reeling in targets after a successful shot.

weapons.name: Cone Launcher
weapons.lore: A shoulder-mounted launcher that fires frozen, lock-on ice cream cones that home in on the target.

weapons.name: Hunting Bow
weapons.lore: A heavy-duty compound bow used by Ice Elf hunters. While technically not a firearm, it serves a similar long-range role.
